articles.title: The lockdown has been lifted at MacDill Air Force Base in Florida after report of armed suspect outside the base
articles.description: The lockdown has been lifted at MacDill Air Force Base in Florida after report of armed suspect outside the base
articles.content:
TAMPA, Fla. -- 
The lockdown has been lifted at MacDill Air Force Base in Florida after report of armed suspect outside the base.

articles.description: MacDill Air Force base in Tampa, Florida, is on lockdown but officials haven't said why
articles.content:
TAMPA, Fla. -- 
MacDill Air Force base in Tampa, Florida, was put on lockdown Friday morning but officials wouldn't immediately say why.

articles.title: Missouri woman who kept son in attic sentenced to probation
articles.description: A Missouri woman who kept her 6-year-old son in an attic during a custody dispute with his father has been sentenced to five years of supervised probation
articles.content:
CAMDENTON, Mo. -- 
A Missouri woman who kept her 6-year-old son hidden in an attic during a custody dispute with the boy's father has been sentenced to five years of supervised probation.

articles.content:
MADRID -- 
Arancha González Laya, a lawyer with a track record in international relations, economics and trade, will be Spain's new foreign minister, the country's new coalition government said Friday.

articles.title: Greece: 13 injured in chase of suspected migrant smugglers
articles.description: Greek police say 13 people have been injured after a car carrying migrants who had crossed into the country from neighboring Turkey crashed into another vehicle following a long, high-speed chase
articles.content:
THESSALONIKI, Greece -- 
A car carrying migrants who had crossed into Greece from neighboring Turkey crashed into another vehicle following a high-speed chase across the north of the country early Friday, leaving 13 people injured, police said.
